description: Either the URL or the ARL files to purge.

url.description: The full, scheme-qualified URL to purge.

items.description:
The set of full, scheme-qualified Akamai resource locator (ARL) files to purge. To purge more than one ARL, separate each value with a newline (`
`) sequence. Use purge by ARL only when other purging methods are ineffective. Your Akamai representative can help you determine whether this method is appropriate.
